name: violet
headline: habits in your calendar
generated_description:
Violet is a company that’s all about helping you become more intentional with your time. Their motto is to embed good habits right into your calendar, making it easier for you to live a more organized life. You can check them out at [byviolet.com](http://www.byviolet.com).

Founded in the Y Combinator Batch S19, Violet is based in New York and has a lean team of 8 employees. Even though we don’t have specific numbers on their early days, the fact that they’re part of Y Combinator suggests they started with a solid premise and vision.

The company is tagged with terms like 'artificial-intelligence’, ‘data-engineering’, 'ai-assistant’, and ‘new-york’. This indicates that their approach likely incorporates advanced technology to help users better manage their time and habits. 

While there isn’t detailed information on their current offerings, the focus seems clear: they want to empower users by integrating productivity into everyday routines. In a world where time is the most valuable currency, Violet aims to be the ally you didn’t know you needed.
